class.name: adsb
class.description: Publish/subscribe to the location and information of an ADS-B vehicle.

class.name: cam_imu_sync
class.description: Publish camera trigger data for synchronisation of IMU and camera frames.

class.name: companion_process_status
class.description: Send companion process status report to the FCU.

class.name: onboard_computer_status
class.description: Send component hadware status to FCU and Groundstation.

class.name: debug_value
class.description: Subs/Pubs debug msgs from and to the FCU.

class.name: distance_sensor
class.description: Publish DISTANCE_SENSOR message data from FCU or connected sensors in companion computer.

class.name: esc_status
class.description: Publish ESC data from FCU.

class.name: fake_gps
class.description: Sends fake GPS from local position estimation source data (motion capture, vision) to FCU.

class.name: gps_status
class.description: Publish GPS_RAW and GPS_RTK messages from FCU.

class.name: gps_rtk
class.description: Sends the RTCM messages to the FCU for the RTK Fix.

class.name: landing_target
class.description: Publish/subscribe to data stream with location of a landing area captured from a downward facing camera.

class.name: log_transfer
class.description: Expose firmware functionality, that is related to log transfer

class.name: mocap_pose_estimate
class.description: Send motion capture pose estimate to FCU.

class.name: obstacle_distance
class.description: Send obstacle distance report to the FCU.

class.name: odom
class.description: Send odometry to FCU from another estimator.

class.name: play_tune
class.description: Send tunes for the FCU to play.

class.name: px4flow
class.description: Publish OPTICAL_FLOW message data from FCU or PX4Flow module.

class.name: rangefinder
class.description: Publish RANGEFINDER message data from FCU sensors in companion computer.

class.name: trajectory
class.description: Receive planned path from the FCU and send back corrected path (collision free, smoothed) to the FCU.

class.name: wheel_odometry
class.description: Compute and publish wheel odometry coming from FCU sensors.

class.name: vibration
class.description: Publish VIBRATION message data from FCU.

class.name: vision_pose_estimate
class.description: Send vision pose estimate to FCU.

class.name: vision_speed_estimate
class.description: Send vision speed estimate to FCU.

class.name: mount_control
class.description: Send Mission command to control a camera or a antenna mount.
